overview: A romantic story inspired by the raw passion and sex appeal of the tango! Andy San Dimas has the world at her feet until she meets a tall, dark stranger. Captivated by Marco Rivera's exotic accent, charming wit and chiseled body, Andy feels the passion of the dance pulling them closer no matter how hard she resists. Then a shocking betrayal sends Andy racing into his arms where they discover the final secret to the tango together.
title: Tango to Romance
